mapper.select:
SELECT MPIM.COMPANY_CD , MPIM.DIVISION_CD , MPIM.INOUT_NO , MPIM.INOUT_NO AS DEPARTURE_NO , ROWIDTOCHAR(MPIM.ROWID) AS KEY_ID , MPIM.PROCESS_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_PROCESS_NAME(MPIM.COMPANY_CD, MPIM.DIVISION_CD, MPIM.PROCESS_CD) FROM DUAL) AS PROCESS_NM , MPIM.TITLE AS INOUT_TITLE , MP.PARTNER_CD , MP.PARTNER_NM , MPIM.DEPARTURE_VENDOR_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_PARTNER_NAME(MPIM.COMPANY_CD,MPIM.DIVISION_CD,MPIM.DEPARTURE_VENDOR_CD) FROM DUAL) AS DEPARTURE_VENDOR_NM , MPIM.WAREHOUSE_CD AS RECEIPT_WAREHOUSE_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_WAREHOUSE_NAME(MPIM.COMPANY_CD,MPIM.DIVISION_CD,MPIM.WAREHOUSE_CD) FROM DUAL) AS RECEIPT_WAREHOUSE_NM , TO_CHAR(MPIM.CONFIRM_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CONFIRM_DATE , TO_CHAR(MPIM.IQC_RECEIPT_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS IQC_RECEIPT_DATE , MPIM.BL_NO , MPIM.IP_NO , MPIM.IP_CURRENCY_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPIM.COMPANY_CD, MPIM.DIVISION_CD, 'SM0017', MPIM.IP_CURRENCY_CD, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS IP_CURRENCY_NM , MPIM.IP_EXCHANGE_RATE , TO_CHAR(MPIM.CC_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CC_DATE , MPIM.LC_NO , MPIM.AMOUNT AS INOUT_AMOUNT , TO_CHAR(MPIM.DEPARTURE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DEPARTURE_DATE , TO_CHAR(MPIM.IQC_FINAL_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS IQC_END_DATE , MPIM.VENDOR_INVOICE , MPIM.FREE_YN AS FREE_YN , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPIM.COMPANY_CD, MPIM.DIVISION_CD, 'MM0015', MPIM.FREE_YN , #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS FREE_YN_NM , MPIM.TAX_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPIM.COMPANY_CD, MPIM.DIVISION_CD, 'SM0029', MPIM.TAX_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS TAX_TYPE_NM , MPIM.CURRENCY_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPIM.COMPANY_CD, MPIM.DIVISION_CD, 'SM0017', MPIM.CURRENCY_CD, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS CURRENCY_NM , MPIM.EXCHANGE_RATE , MPIM.DESCRIPTION , MPIM.CREATE_BY AS CREATE_USER_NO , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MPIM.COMPANY_CD, MPIM.DIVISION_CD, MPIM.CREATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS CREATE_USER_NM , TO_CHAR(MPIM.CREATE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE , MPIM.IQC_RECEIPT_USER_NO , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MPIM.COMPANY_CD, MPIM.DIVISION_CD, MPIM.IQC_RECEIPT_USER_NO) FROM DUAL ) AS IQC_RECEIPT_USER_NM FROM MOM_PURCHASE_INOUT_MST MPIM , MOM_PARTNER MP WHERE MPIM.COMPANY_CD = MP.COMPANY_CD AND MPIM.DIVISION_CD = MP.DIVISION_CD AND MPIM.VENDOR_CD = MP.PARTNER_CD AND MPIM.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPIM.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPIM.IQC_FINAL_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{iqcEndDateSD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{iqcEndDateED, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 0.99999
AND (UPPER(MPIM.INOUT_NO) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{inoutNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND (UPPER(MPIM.VENDOR_CD) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{partnerCdNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR UPPER(MP.PARTNER_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{partnerCdNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND MPIM.PROCESS_CD = #{processCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (UPPER(MPIM.TITLE) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{inoutTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND MPIM.WAREHOUSE_CD = #{receiptWarehouseCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND MPIM.IQC_FLAG = 'Y' AND MPIM.IQC_FINAL_RESULT = 'P' AND MPIM.PROCESS_CD NOT IN ('OP', 'OR') ORDER BY MPIM.INOUT_NO

SELECT MPID.COMPANY_CD , MPID.DIVISION_CD , MPID.INOUT_NO AS RECEIPT_NO , MPID.SEQ , MPID.ITEM_ID , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.ITEM_SPEC , MI.ITEM_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPID.COMPANY_CD, MPID.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MPID.INOUT_UOM AS PURCHASE_UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MPID.COMPANY_CD, MPID.DIVISION_CD, MPID.INOUT_UOM) FROM DUAL) AS PURCHASE_UOM_NM , MPID.CONVERSION_UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MI.COMPANY_CD, MPID.DIVISION_CD, MPID.CONVERSION_UOM) FROM DUAL) AS CONVERSION_UOM_NM , MPID.CONVERSION_QTY , MPID.INOUT_QTY AS RECEIPT_REQUEST_QTY , MPID.IQC_RESULT AS INSPECTION_RESULT , MPID.LOT_ID , MPID.LOT_RULE AS LOT_RULE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPID.COMPANY_CD, MPID.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0052', MPID.LOT_RULE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS LOT_RULE_NM , MPID.UNIT_PRICE , MPID.AMOUNT , MPID.LOCAL_AMOUNT , MPID.REASON_CD AS EXP_RCV_REASON_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPID.COMPANY_CD, MPID.DIVISION_CD, 'MM0016', MPID.REASON_CD, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS EXP_RCV_REASON_NM , MPID.STOCK_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPID.COMPANY_CD, MPID.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0048', MPID.STOCK_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS STOCK_TYPE_NM , MPID.DESCRIPTION , MPID.PURCHASE_INOUT_ID , NVL(MPID.LOT_MANAGEMENT_YN, 'N') AS LOT_MANAGEMENT_YN , TO_CHAR(MPID.IQC_RESULT_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS IQC_RESULT_DATE , MPID.IQC_RESULT_USER_NO , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MPID.COMPANY_CD, MPID.DIVISION_CD, MPID.IQC_RESULT_USER_NO) FROM DUAL) AS IQC_RESULT_USER_NM , (SELECT MIL.IQC_RESULT_NO FROM MOM_IQC_LABEL MIL WHERE MIL.COMPANY_CD = MPID.COMPANY_CD AND MIL.DIVISION_CD = MPID.DIVISION_CD AND MIL.INOUT_NO = MPID.INOUT_NO AND MIL.SEQ = MPID.SEQ ) AS IQC_RESULT_NO , ROWIDTOCHAR(MPID.ROWID) AS KEY_ID FROM MOM_PURCHASE_INOUT_DTL MPID , MOM_ITEM MI WHERE MPID.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MPID.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MPID.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MPID.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPID.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPID.INOUT_NO = #{inoutNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY MPID.INOUT_NO , MPID.SEQ
